text.div:
This value set does not contain a fixed number of concepts

PersonalRelationshipRoleType

Types of personal relationships between two living subjects. Example:
Parent, sibling, unrelated friend, neighbor (OID = 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.19563)

This value set includes codes defined in other code systems, using the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/RoleCode where concept is-a _PersonalRelationshipRoleType

name: PersonalRelationshipRoleType
description:
